headers.value: default-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; block-all-mixed-content; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; frame-src 'none'; img-src 'self' data: www.google-analytics.com *.googleapis.com *.gstatic.com *.youtube.com; script-src 'self' www.google-analytics.com www.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com; connect-src 'self' www.google-analytics.com *.googleapis.com
